item.description:
The movie starts at 6:30 PM. So why don't we meet in front of the escalators closest to the main entrance off of Tremont Street at 6 PM. Try to get there and have your tickets by 6pm. If we go in to the theater too late we might not be able to sit together.

The lobby tends to be a bit crazy....I will be wearing a little movie fan badge so those who don't know me will be able to recognize me.

After the movie we can grab a bite to eat. There are several places close to the theater...we don't want to walk too far in this cold!

See you there!
item.name: Because I said So
